creation.title: An error occurred during the preparation of your payment.
creation.message: Try to validate your order again and if the problem persists, please contact the site administrator to inform it.

redirection.title: An error occurred during the redirect to our payment provider.
redirection.message: Try to validate your order again and if the problem persists, please contact the site administrator to inform it.

iframe.title: An error occurred while displaying the payment page.
iframe.message: Try to validate your order again and if the problem persists, please contact the site administrator to inform it.

customer_return.title: An error occurred during the confirmation of your payment.
customer_return.message: Please contact the site administrator to inform them.

validation.title: An error occurred during the preparation of your payment.
validation.message: Try to validate your order again and if the problem persists, please contact the site administrator to inform it.
